name: Coffee break (your bones)
description:
Half visual novel, half action, in this game, in order to have success you must understand that people are more nuanced than it may seem, treat them harshly and they may take it out on you, but befriend them and they'll treat you alright.

Controls:
  • W/Up - Jump
  • S/Down - Crouch
  • Space/Left Click - Shoot
Credits:
  • Afonso Cunha - Art
  • Alexandre Duarte - Programming
  • Nuno Ramos - Programming

We are part of a college game dev group - GameDev Técnico. You can find us at itch.io, facebook and twitter!
